pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A Geany plugin to support the ycmd code completion server limited to ycmd completion.
Features:
- Smarter completion with library methods - Improved relevant matching - Keyword completion

use.flag: Configure the plugin to use the system's clangd instead of ycmd internal clangd.
